strategyDescriptions.lump-sum: Invest the entire amount at the start date and hold. Simple buy-and-hold strategy.
strategyDescriptions.dca: Invest a fixed amount at regular intervals (daily, weekly, or monthly), regardless of price. Reduces the impact of volatility.
strategyDescriptions.rsi-dca: Weekly DCA with increased purchases when RSI indicates oversold conditions. Skips buying when overbought.
strategyDescriptions.dip-buyer-dca: Weekly DCA with increased purchases when price drops significantly from recent highs. Buy the dip strategy.
strategyDescriptions.moving-average-dca: Weekly DCA with increased purchases when price is below the moving average. Trend-following strategy.
strategyDescriptions.combined-smart-dca: Combines RSI, Moving Average, and Dip Buyer signals to adjust weekly DCA purchases. Most sophisticated strategy.

parameterModal.title: Customize Parameters - {strategy}
parameterModal.noParameters: No customizable parameters for this strategy

rsi.oversoldThresholdHelp: RSI value below which to buy more (default: 30)
rsi.overboughtThresholdHelp: RSI value above which to skip buying (default: 70)
rsi.buyMultiplierHelp: Multiplier for purchase amount when oversold (default: 2.0x)

dip.lookbackDaysHelp: Number of days to look back for recent high (default: 30)
dip.dropThresholdHelp: Percentage drop from recent high to trigger buy (default: 10%)
dip.buyMultiplierHelp: Multiplier for purchase amount when dip detected (default: 2.0x)

ma.buyMultiplierHelp: Multiplier for purchase amount when price below MA (default: 2.0x)

combined.oversoldThresholdHelp: RSI value below which to buy more (default: 30)
combined.lookbackDaysHelp: Number of days to look back for recent high (default: 30)
combined.dropThresholdHelp: Percentage drop from recent high to trigger buy (default: 10%)
combined.maxMultiplierHelp: Maximum multiplier when multiple signals align (default: 3.0x)
